item.title: Impacts of COVID-19 on International Relations
item.description: Who had thought that our human civilization would be threatened by the outbreak of a pandemic and it will radically change the way of doing things? Apart from a few Hollywood blockbusters, influential TED speakers, fictional writers, and health researchers, no one had anticipated the scale of the crisis of...

item.title: United Nations in the Contemporary World
item.description: UN has been a pioneering multilateral global body for the last 74 years in the area of humanitarian response, aiding the member states, preventing conflicts, maintaining peace and security.UN has been underrepresented, non-inclusive, and structurally partial in the exercise and powers in the decision making especially in its organ, the...

item.title: Possible US-Iran conflict and its impacts on Nepal
item.description: Have you ever thought about the impacts of the US-Iran conflict on Nepal? The Islamic Republic of Iran and the US have been hostile since the advent of the Iranian Revolution which led to dethrone of US-backed Monarch Mohammad Reza Shah Pahlavi and the start of the theocratic rule of...

item.title: Diplomats, Diplomacy and the challenges in the Modern World
item.description: Diplomacy is simply the art, science, or management of the relationship between countries (eg. Russia, India, Nepal), international organizations (eg. World Bank, UN, IMF, EU) in a skillful way by the professionals called Diplomats. Diplomacy has always been a non-violent approach in maintaining relationships among nations and organizations through dialogue,...
